skill.name: create-skill-file
skill.description: Guides Claude in creating well-structured SKILL.md files following best practices. Provides clear guidelines for naming, structure, and content organization to make skills easy to discover and execute.
skill.summary: Guides Claude in creating well-structured SKILL.md files following best practices. Provides clear gu...
skill.author: labring

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill with no code execution, file access, network calls, or system modifications. Contains only guidelines, templates, and examples for creating SKILL.md files.

content.value_statement: Creating quality SKILL.md files is challenging without clear guidelines. This skill provides templates, examples, and best practices to help you create skills that are easy to discover and execute.
actual_capabilities: Provides basic skill template with required sections and structure
Offers workflow skill template with multi-step process design
Shows good and bad skill examples with detailed explanations
Defines naming conventions and description requirements
Explains progressive disclosure and file organization patterns
Includes quality checklists for skill validation
limitations: Does not execute code or modify files directly
Does not validate existing skills automatically
Does not generate skills from user requirements
Requires manual application of templates by the user

use_cases.title: Create new skills
use_cases.description: Use templates to create well-structured SKILL.md files with proper naming and documentation

use_cases.title: Improve existing skills
use_cases.description: Refactor poorly written skills using the good example patterns and best practices guide

use_cases.title: Establish skill standards
use_cases.description: Define team-wide skill creation guidelines based on the provided conventions and quality checklist

prompt_templates.title: Create basic skill
prompt_templates.scenario: Starting a new skill from scratch
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a SKILL.md file for a skill that does [specific task]. Use the basic skill template from create-skill-file.

prompt_templates.title: Create workflow skill
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a SKILL.md file for a workflow skill that handles [complex process]. Include preparation, steps, error handling, and rollback. Use the workflow template.

prompt_templates.title: Review skill quality
prompt_templates.prompt: Review my SKILL.md file for quality issues. Check naming conventions, description clarity, trigger keywords, example completeness, and structure organization.

prompt_templates.title: Refactor bad skill
prompt_templates.prompt: Take this SKILL.md file and refactor it. It is too vague. Apply the good example patterns from create-skill-file to make it specific and actionable.

output_examples.input: Create a skill for database migrations using Alembic
output: Description: Manages database schema migrations using Alembic for SQLAlchemy projects
When to Use: User asks to create migrations, upgrade/downgrade database
Sections: Quick Start, How It Works, Examples, Best Practices, Troubleshooting

best_practices: Use specific names with action verbs and kebab-case format
Include trigger keywords and scenarios in description for easy activation
Keep content focused on project-specific knowledge Claude does not already know
Provide concrete examples with actual code, not abstract descriptions
anti_patterns: Avoid generic names like helper, utility, or manager
Do not include information Claude already knows like basic programming concepts
Do not write overly detailed tutorials instead of actionable guidelines
Avoid missing trigger keywords that would prevent skill activation

faq.question: What tools does this skill support?
faq.answer: Supports Claude, Codex, and Claude Code through standardized SKILL.md format compatible with all.

faq.question: What is the ideal length for a SKILL.md?
Can I integrate this with my CI/CD pipeline?
faq.answer: This skill provides documentation only. Integration requires adding validation scripts to your pipeline separately.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill only reads templates and writes new documentation. No data leaves your environment.

faq.question: Why is my skill not activating?
faq.answer: Check that your description contains specific keywords users would actually type. Avoid generic terms like helper.

faq.question: How does this compare to other skill creation tools?
faq.answer: This provides templates and guidelines. Unlike code generators, it teaches skill design principles for better results.
